brainly_data.question: How to retrieve deleted texts on android without computer?
brainly_data.subject: Computers and technology

all_answers.question: How to retrieve deleted texts on android without computer?
all_answers.subject: Computers and technology
all_answers.text: Once text messages are deleted from a phone , they are gone. howerver in some cases you may be able to retrieve them within a timeframe from when they were sent and recieved by your carrier ..... like at&t , verizon etc.
